title: Michael J.
text:
Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering - Programming Design & Machine Learning | Senior (Student)
Brigham-Young University-Idaho
July 2020 - Current
- Minor: Computer Programming
- Certificates: Computer-Aided Design and Drafting (CADD), Machine Learning Fundamentals
- GPA: 3.37





Certified SolidWorks Associate (CSWA)

Certified SolidWorks Professional (CSWPA-DT)

OSHA 10-Hour Safety Certification








Python and C# Applications: Developed Python and C# applications, utilizing Pygame for retro games and C# for logic-intensive projects like Checkers and Snake. Applied Big O Notation to optimize algorithms for efficiency and scalable performance.

Data Analysis: Conducted data analysis using SQL and SQLite; visualized results with Pandas and Lets-Plot to generate insights, supporting data-driven decision-making.

Machine Learning: Integrated machine learning fundamentals, such as predictive modeling, in project coursework.





Software Engineering: Big O Notation, Object-Oriented Design, Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC), Debugging, Testing, Software Design Patterns, Agile Methodologies

Programming Skills: Python, C#, HTML5, CSS, SQL, SQLite

Data Science & Machine Learning: Pandas, Lets-Plot, Data Analysis, Data Visualization, Machine Learning Algorithms

Tools & Technologies: SolidWorks (CSWA, CSWPA-DT), CAD software, Git for Version Control, Pygame (for interactive game development), Modular Code Design






Junior Production Technician
Environmental Stone Works (Cornerstone Building Brands) | St. George, Utah
Aug 2022 - Dec 2022
- Enhanced technical communication skills and team collaboration in high-demand settings.
Construction Worker
Precision Precast and Construction | Rexburg, Idaho
Jan 2023 - Jul 2024
- Worked with CAD designs and coordinated with teams to manage complex, technical tasks.




Detail-oriented and highly adaptable Software Engineering student with a robust proficiency in Python, C#, SQL, and data science methodologies. Demonstrates strong analytical abilities with expertise in algorithm efficiency, Big O notation, and project-based development.
Known for a quick learning curve when tackling new programming languages and technical tools, showing a proven ability to efficiently absorb and apply complex concepts across diverse projects.
A team-oriented collaborator and problem solver, with an emphasis on effective communication and English language competency to convey technical requirements clearly and precisely. Also possesses a high level of attention to detail and a commitment to software design best practices, excelling in areas like data analysis, software architecture, and user-focused design.
Passionate about innovation, constantly seeking to refine and improve systems for both technical accuracy and user experience. Demonstrates a thorough understanding of the software development life cycle (SDLC), with a strong grasp of design patterns, modular code, debugging, and Agile methodologies. Driven to contribute and grow within dynamic programming environments where precision, innovation, and continuous improvement are valued.
